aboutMe: I started my adventure as a developer in 2011 in "Imagen Central" company, this is when I fell in love with this profession by working together with very passionate people.
My adventure continues now with more than 10 years of experience like freelance, working in large and small companies and startups, developing skills such as project management and negotiation.
And yes, I have remained in love with my profession since the first day I decided to dedicate myself to it.

duties: I continuously improve the web and mobile app user's experience by searching for new technologies.
After the mobile app code was managed externally I implemented the management internally which reduced costs and allowed the brand to have full control of the design and the code.
Not only I led the México web and app projects, I also developed and led the USA eCommerce and mobile app. I also developed the mobile application used for international trips.
I continuously migrate all my API REST and web development work to AWS from the company servers.

I developed with my team the Wilson Sports Mx eCommerce with our own code. I also contributed to the creation of a tool that any person without programming skills could create their own personalized eCommerce.
With the Magento platform I developed the eCommerce web page.
I connected the Walmart API REST with our admin backoffice for supply chain communication purposes.
I managed the backend and front-end maintenance according to administrative requests.
I program the requested views and solve errors reported by the QA team.

I programmed the mobile application front-end for the Colombian government “InfoCandidato”. The senate and presidency candidates could interact with the colombian citizens in a more friendly way. My observations and communication improved the user's experience.
